name: ZOOKEEPER : Blast Quest
summary:
＊New Major Update! 
Battle Mode Unlocked! Fight in real-time!

A new feature is now available, allowing you to compete with players worldwide. The speed and accuracy of your puzzle-solving hold the key to victory.
Clear three puzzle stages before your opponent to achieve victory."

The latest series of the famous tile-matching puzzle game "ZOOKEEPER," played by more than 30 MILLIONS of people around the world, is now in VR!

Play a brand-new feel Puzzle; Destroy matching color blocks using Shooter, more...
